summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AgroLink CRM system. Backend APIs working 100%, frontend working with minor SelectItem component fixes applied. All core functionality tested successfully including login, dashboard, client management, project management, and admin features.
passed_tests: Client management - create, list, get by ID
Project management - create, list, get by ID, timeline features
Project timeline - add pendencia, add observacao, update documents
New client form with all required fields
New project page navigation and client search
Admin features access (Partners, Users, Etapas, Configurações)
